title: Milk
creator_credit: Television New Zealand, Martin Didsbury and Denis Harvey
brief_description: Shows how conventional dairy processing has been diversified to include such varied products as case in (used in the pharmaceutical and plastics industry) and minipad butter (used in the travel and hospitality industries) and cheescakes. Provides a good insight into the diversity of manufacturing that takes place in a modern dairy.
